data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the county of Ain.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Ain, Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes, France
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, purify the 7,445 believers in the county of Ain to not just be hearers, but doers of your Word.
data.verse: Blessed is the one who reads aloud the words of this prophecy, and blessed are those who hear it and take to heart what is written in it, because the time is near.

data.section_summary: On average, 39 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next 100 hours in Ain, Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes, France.
data.prayer: Jesus, send your gospel to these.
the county of Ain has (about) 7,445 people who know Jesus, 370,520 people who know about him culturally, and 227,935 people who are far from Jesus.
Spirit, please start new house churches in every neighborhood of the county of Ain.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Ain, Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes, France and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.prayer: Over 37.62 percent of the people of Ain are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!

data.section_summary:
the county of Ain, Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes, France has a population of 605,900.

We estimate Ain has 7,445 people who might know Jesus, 370,520 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 227,935 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 81 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the county of Ain that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.
